body:
https://avicus.net/forums/a8217b619?page=2

So recently I came across this and I'd just like to say that lance ddossing Impact is very unlikely. I'm good friends with a few of the members in impact and I'm pretty sure I recall eps saying to me they just forgot that the tourny was then, I'll confirm with him tonight before anymore people give michael shit about 'ddossing all of impact'

title: Impact being ddossed

replies.body:
It's true. Epsilpha (sorry if I got the name wrong) admitted that he didn't get DDoS'd on a Skype chat.

Juanoh is the one who brought Eps into the chat, and that is where Eps said he wasn't DDoS'd.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Yeah, Tazz asked paul earlier he said they forgot too.
Also think about this, someone wouldn't ddos the entire of the impact team of request and you can only really ddos one at a time unless you have some freaky ass booter. So one goes down then comes back up and the team would function fine, like it's unrealistic.
